name: Rich Santa
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
Rich Santa is a community token created to help and give charity to people in need. 
Last year we gave to charity 3.000$ and this year we plan to give even more helping Ukraine people in need. 

We have been audited and passed (github here) : https://github.com/TechRate/Smart-Contract-Audits/blob/main/December/Rich%20Santa.pdf

We are currently listed on Coinmarketcap and we would like to be listed on Coingecko as well:
https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/rich-santa/
